tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    current_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE project_expenses (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    expense_date DATE,
    expense_description TEXT,
    expense_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  total_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE project_expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  expense_date DATE,
  expense_description TEXT,
  amount_spent DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT REFERENCES projects(project_id),
  expense_date DATE,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE project_expenses (project_id INT REFERENCES projects(project_id),
  expense_id INT REFERENCES expenses(expense_id),
  PRIMARY KEY(project_id, expense_id)
)

CREATE TABLE expenses (
  expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  expense_date DATE NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_categories (
  project_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY(project_id, category_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_expenses (
  project_id INT,
  expense_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY(project_id, expense_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (expense_id) REFERENCES expenses(expense_id)
);
